resources.string:
After every 1 second one of the square will change its colour to grey.It will remain grey for 1 second.After 1 second it will come back to its original colour and one square from rest of the 3 will change its colour.

Game can get over in two conditions:
1. You taps on a tile which is not grey.
2. You does not tap on tile when it was grey.

In this level the square color chaining interval will be %s second.You will get %s points for every correct taps.
You will get an extra bonus point of %s if you tap on the grey square only in %s milliseconds or bonus point of %s if you tap only in %s milliseconds.
For every %s clicks on any square will give you %s bonus points.
